TextLibrary.Text: There are still no signs of any Dragons, and a huge Iron Golem blocks the way into Kelthurax's Lair.
You have failed to gain entry to the lair. You must try again.
You shouldn't enter without Elistara in your party!
You have helped Elistara fulfil her oath and deliver the message.
You must travel to the Dragonrealm and gain entry to Kelthurax's Lair.
